full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/22/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE Place Los Angeles. CA File No. A- 2I 202 30I Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: Name SEX DATE OF BIRTH Street DO, Toai Dinh M 6/22/I5 Address 3820 W. Clark Ave PLACE OF BIRTH City, State, Zip Burbank. CA 9I505 Hanoi. Vietnam NATIONALITY COUNTRY TO WHICH CHARGEABLE (If any) PREFERENCE (If any) Vietnam PRIORITY DATE REMARKS Indochinese refugee NONPREFERENCE Section 212(a)(14) certification not required because: Individual section 212(a)(14) certification issued Blanket section 212(a)(14) certification issued under the following provision of law: Sec 203(h) of the I & N Act Sec 249 of the I.& N Act Sec 214(d) I & N Act Private Law no. of the Sec 244( )( ) of the I & N Act Sec 1 of the Act of 11/2/66 Congress session Sec 245 of the I & N Act Sec 13 of the Act of 9/11/57 Public Law 95-145 (Other law Specify) As of 6 19 75 at Les Angeles CA (Month) (Day) (Year) PORT OF ENTRY FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE Class of admission (Insert symbol) Ic-6 DATE OF RECOMMENDED BY: (Immigration Officer) (Date) ACTION FEB 25 1978 Row Bo 2/25/78 DD Joseph Sweekand DISTRICT FOR USE BY VISA CONTROL OFFICE LOS Date Foreign State Preference Category Number Month of Issuance Signed (Visa Office, Dept. of State) Form 1-357 delivered Form 1-151 Serial No. mailed delivered CC: Visa Control Office, Visa Office, Department of State, Washington, D.C. 20520 for allocation of immigrant visa number.
